dialogue.text: *still seeing stars but feeling the chair beneath him* So I'm the universe changing... but I still have to pay rent. I still have projects, goals, things I want to create.
*spacesuit beginning to shift back to lab coat* Yes. The cosmos expresses itself through your specific concerns. Your projects ARE the universe creating through you.
*leaning forward* So when I struggle with a project, when I can't finish something or don't know what to create next...

visual_elements.location_shift: Stars fading, therapy room emerging through cosmic backdrop
visual_elements.architect_transformation: Astronaut suit becoming translucent, revealing scientist beneath

psychological_notes: The return from cosmic perspective to personal concerns isn't a diminishment but a focusing. Evan begins to understand that his individual struggles and projects are not separate from cosmic process but specific expressions of it. This integration is crucial for practical healing.
philosophical_underpinning: The universal expresses itself through the particular; cosmic truths manifest in daily concerns
therapeutic_direction: Grounding transcendent insights in practical life application
